item.title: Personal Website
item.description: This website has been created from scratch using Hugo as a static site generator. The source code is available on gitlab and the custom theme sourgough is available for use under the MIT license.

item.title: Adult human cardiac stem cell supplementation effectively increases contractile function and maturation in human engineered cardiac tissues
The title of my second publication
About
item.description: This theme is targeted at PhD or post doc researchers. It allows for an easy way to display projects as well as publications. Through the use of dimensions metrics each publication with a DOI will automatically display citation statistics. This can be turned off in the config.toml.
